scripts.babel-mjs: lerna exec --parallel -- babel src -d lib-mjs --copy-files --env-name mjs
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:test && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:test: npm run lerna -- NODE_ENV=coverage nyc npm test -- -c
scripts.coverage:report: npm run lerna -- nyc report --reporter=text-lcov ">" coverage.lcov
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: npm run babel && npm run babel-mjs
